name: Cryptid Combat
description:
Cryptid Combat is an asymmetrical card-battling strategy game that I made for my class "Visual Communication and Interaction Design (ARTG 80G)" at UCSC.  It is inspired by firsthand accounts of Cryptids around the USA and around the world.  The game is playable by 1 Cryptid player, and 1-3 Human players, although modification of rules to account for more players is certainly possible. Enjoy!

https://playingcards.io/6vn3y3
